title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
author: Stan Lee
description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man.

title: Iron Man: Extremis
author: Warren Ellis
description: Tony Stark battles a techno-organic virus and pushes the limits of his armor technology.

title: The Avengers
author: Stan Lee & Jack Kirby
description: Earth's mightiest heroes assemble to combat threats beyond any one hero's capability.

title: Black Panther
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates
description: T’Challa defends Wakanda from internal and external threats.

title: Captain Marvel
author: Kelly Sue DeConnick
description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe’s most powerful heroes.
